meanings.definition: The part of the leg between the hip and the knee.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sharp pain in her thigh after running.
meanings.sent2: He injured his thigh while playing soccer.
meanings.sent3: Carrying all those heavy bags made her thigh muscles ache.
meanings.sent4: The road was so steep it felt like climbing a mountain with each step up her thigh.
meanings.sent5: The runner's thighs burned with exertion as she neared the finish line.

meanings.definition: The fleshy part of the human body that is on the front of the leg above the knee.
meanings.sent1: She admired the dancer's toned thighs during the performance.
meanings.sent2: He applied lotion to his dry thigh to moisturize the skin.
meanings.sent3: The cat rubbed its head against her thigh seeking attention.
meanings.sent4: The juicy steak left a greasy stain on her white thigh.
meanings.sent5: The baby gripped her thigh tightly as she carried him around the room.
